title: Sea Conditions schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of sea conditions

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be SeaConditions

waveLevel.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Douglas sea scale'. It indicates the height of the waves and also measures the swell of the sea.

surfaceTemperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Celsius degrees'. Sea surface temperature.

waveHeight.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Meters'. Height of the waves.

wavePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Seconds'. Indicates the time between the crests of a wave.

pH.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution.

salinity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Parts per thousand'. Amount of salts dissolved in water.

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format.
